channel.title: Play WoW private servers or want to get into them? Look here!
channel.description:
Website - Gotta ask first Forums - Gotta ask first
We're using the MaNGOS server which is 85% like blizzard with just a few bugs which are sorted out the seconed they're found. I'm running the forums so make sure you sign up there! I'll have a sticky with the exact details on getting on but until sunday when I get home from a wedding you need to look at the MSN list and contact a Game-master for now. Thanks

item.title: Play WoW private servers or want to get into them? Look here!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

one uglybird:

Dude, posting about WoW priv servers in a RS priv server forum thing… That’s border-line blasphemy.

No, www.moarscape.org/smf IS THE RUNESCAPE PRIVATE SERVER CLIENT FORUM.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

rom:

how do i play with ppl in mopar

These are WoW severs not Moparscape servers. Go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf for anything related to moparscape. Thief, send me the information in a PM please.

Read full topic
